channel.title: PyBites - Data
channel.description: A Community that Masters Python through Code Challenges

item.title: Automating PyBites Review Post Using Github API and collections.defaultdict
item.description: In this post I share a quick script I produced last week to automate a portion of our review post. There are some nice idioms that you might find useful.
item.dc:creator: Bob

item.title: Read the stdlib: deque
item.description: Use collections.deque to rotate letters in string (or elements in list). It has a native method which performs faster too.
item.dc:creator: Bob
